Subject: Critical issue: Critical api issue in user-api (us-east-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The user-api service in the us-east-1 region is experiencing critical issues with the /api/v1/products endpoint. The endpoint is returning 500 status codes, indicating server errors, and is associated with high latency (534.91 ms). This issue affects all users attempting to access product information, leading to potential frustration and loss of sales. The problem appears to be recurring, likely due to backend service failures or database query issues.
